author: rwaldhoff
msg: * Combining functionality of URIUtil and URLUtil into URIUtil, removing URLUtil
* Renaming State to HttpState for consistency
* Removing references to collections (Iterator/Enumeration) from "public" API (using arrays instead)
* Some changes to Authentictor to allow for Digest authentication
* Moved current Credentials down to UsernamePasswordCredentials, made Credentials an interface
* Adding overview doc, some other doc fixes

author: rwaldhoff
msg: add some additional pathSafe characters to URIUtil
have PostMethod use URIUtil rather than URLEncoder
remove legacy URI encoding methods from State

author: rwaldhoff
msg: * using URIUtil.encode for query string params and paths (HttpMethodBase)
